Design that moves.
Web for brands that refuse to blend in.

Visual & Web
Designer

Websites that feel alive, perform fast
and stay memorable.

Visual & web designer based in Mumbai, working globally

I design scroll‑stopping experiences—visual identities and digital spaces that feel alive and fast. Motion-first thinking, bold typography, and responsive systems lead, with WebGL/Three.js and GSAP when it serves the story. Based in Mumbai, working globally on brand launches, campaigns, and portfolios that stay memorable.
